body_html: I thought webpacker was shipped with Rails v5.1 by default now? If that is so, this is definitely not too much to ask of a dev. And in any event, we need a line or two in our README anyway, so people should be able to just copy/paste it into the terminal.

body: I thought webpacker was shipped with Rails v5.1 by default now? If that is so, this is definitely not too much to ask of a dev. And in any event, we need a line or two in our README anyway, so people should be able to just copy/paste it into the terminal.
